Thesis Investigation Archive

This site hosts the practical, open-source investigation component of my Master's thesis.
It focuses on biometric voice analysis, asylum procedures, and algorithmic governmentality.

  • DIAS Case – investigation of the Dialect Identification Assistance System
  • More cases and material will be added as the research progresses.

Archival platform for my Master's thesis. Built with Eleventy & vanilla JS.
